issue.title: [CF 52] Pet ability cooldowns
issue.body:
ATTATCHING A SAVED VARIABLE FILE WILL GET YOUR TICKET ANSWERED 200 TIMES FASTER

SAVED VARIABLE FILES CAN BE FOUND IN "World of Warcraft/WTF/Account/<ACOOUNTNAME>/<REALMNAME>/<CHARNAME>/SavedVariables/TellMeWhen. lua"

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Create a spell coodown button for worm burrow attack and chimaera froststorm breath Ability "Burrow Attack;Froststorm Breath" icon enabled, spell cooldown, show when ability usable.
2. If worm is out, dismiss worm
3. Summon worm.
(Note, I've seen similar behavior with other pet ability cooldown buttons, but this is a representative example).

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

Seeing following lua error repeating continuously until tmw is unlocked and relocked

Message: Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1226: IsSpellInRange(): Invalid spell slot
Time: 11/24/10 11:05:13
Count: 117
Stack: [C]: ?
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1226: in function <Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1194>

Locals: (*temporary) = nil
(*temporary) = "target"

What version of the product are you using?
Version: 2.0.3

Do you have an error log of what happened?

See above.

Please provide any additional information below.
